title: Le Pain Quotidien -  Galerie de la Reine
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Western, Bakery, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Situated within the famous "Galeries Royales Saint-Hubert", 5 minutes walk from Brussels Central station. International restaurant chain featuring organic artisan bakery and communal table. Menu includes several ovo-lacto vegetarian dishes and a few vegan ones plus a vegan muffin. Many locations in Belgium.
